googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Valerie Furst
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: Boxcar, Chris Seals is the only handymen I trust and use. He has done several jobs for me in the last two years since I moved here. I am very fortunate to have him help me. There are so many scams and bad people out there. Chris does an excellent job, detail oriented, tries to save money the best he can. Chris has helped me through emergencies and always shows up even though he is extremely busy. His skills as an electrician has been amazing in my kitchen in my open cabinets. Chris has the ability to “ work out” problems in my home that I wanted but didn’t think it was possible. Very good work, trustworthy and great pricing!
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: boxcar the handyman

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Cathy Buttner
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: Unfortunately Boxcar never sent me a quote or parts list after spending an hour and 1/2 with me looking at the repairs needed at my house.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.responseFromOwnerText: Hello mamm I'm very sorry bout that I've got so much going on it slipped my mind I would st I ll like to do the work for u if needed thx
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: boxcar the handyman

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Jasmine Graben
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: Awesome, Awesome, awesome! He was fast, professional, and fair. 10/10, will definitely be giving him a call in the future!
googleReviewsBySlug.json.responseFromOwnerText: Thank you was glad I could help
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: boxcar the handyman

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: John Henderson
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: I request Chris  Seals to installed 4 poach columns in front of my house and he did an excellent job.  He did everything we agreed upon to complete the job and then some.  He took his time and ensured the job was done correctly.  He always kept me informed as what was he doing even when he departed the job to pick up supplies.  His price was very reasonable.  I strongly recommend him.  I plan to use his services again.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.responseFromOwnerText: Ty sir glad was able to help you out call if you need me again thank you
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: boxcar the handyman

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: David Edmonds
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text:
We have used Chris on numerous jobs over the last few years. He shows up.on time. Does quality work and cleans up when finished. I highly recommend.

David Edmonds
Edmonds Home Improvement
googleReviewsBySlug.json.responseFromOwnerText: Thank you for the work u have given me
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: boxcar the handyman

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: kelly mercado
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: I needed help mounting my tv on my tv stand. The movers didn’t leave the screws in the box when I moved. I called Chris and he did a great job getting me the screws and putting the TV up. I knew I would need help in the future for things around the house as I just moved here and don’t really know anyone yet. So glad I found Chris! He was helpful and very professional! Will be calling him again anytime I need things done!
googleReviewsBySlug.json.responseFromOwnerText: Thank you  for the rating and comment was my pleasure and glad was able to help you out thanks again
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: boxcar the handyman

plumberResearchFull.json:
### Business Information:

**Alabama Business Registration/License Details:**
- Boxcar The Handyman does not require a specific handyman license in Alabama, as the state does not issue licenses for handyman services valued under $10,000. However, for larger projects or specific trades like electrical or plumbing, a general contractor's license would be necessary. There is no indication that Boxcar The Handyman holds such a license, suggesting they operate within the scope of general handyman services[4].

**Physical Location and Service Areas:**
- The business is located at 10404 Parliament Dr SW, Huntsville, AL 35803-2006. It serves the North Alabama area[1][2].

**Hours and Payment Methods:**
- There is no detailed information on the specific hours of operation for Boxcar The Handyman, but it is mentioned that the owner serves the area and is available for various tasks. Payment methods are not explicitly stated, but it is implied that standard payment options are available given the nature of the services[2].

**Years in Operation:**
- The BBB file for Boxcar The Handyman was opened on June 10, 2022, indicating that the business has been operating for at least a couple of years, though the exact start date is not specified[1].

### Services & Specialties:

**Types of Services Offered:**
- Boxcar The Handyman provides a wide range of services including electrical work, flooring, walls, and more. Specific services mentioned include drywall repair, installations (such as sliding doors, ceiling fans, and window blinds), and general maintenance[2][5].

**Service Areas Covered:**
- The business serves the North Alabama area, with a focus on Huntsville[1][2].

**Emergency Service Availability:**
- There is no explicit mention of emergency service availability, but the business is described as a handyman service that can handle various tasks, suggesting potential flexibility in response to urgent needs[2].

**Any Listed Prices or Rates:**
- The business emphasizes competitive pricing, with the owner stating that "My prices can't be beat." However, no specific rates or prices are listed[2].

### Customer Reviews & Reputation:

**Review Summaries with Specific Examples:**
- While specific review content is not provided in the sources, the business has a rating of 4.6 based on 9 reviews, indicating generally positive feedback.

**BBB Rating and Status:**
- Boxcar The Handyman is not a BBB Accredited Business. It has a BBB rating of "A" based on the length of time the business has been operating, but it has not undergone the BBB's vetting process for accreditation[1].

**Common Customer Feedback Themes:**
- There is no detailed analysis of customer feedback themes available from the provided sources.

**Response to Reviews:**
- There is no information on how the business responds to customer reviews.

### Owner & Staff:

**Owner/Management Information:**
- The owner of Boxcar The Handyman is Mr. Chris Seals[1].

**Staff Qualifications:**
- There is no detailed information on the qualifications of the staff beyond the owner's involvement in the business.

**Professional Certifications:**
- There is no mention of any specific professional certifications held by the owner or staff of Boxcar The Handyman[1][2][4].
aboutUs: At Boxcar The Handyman, we are a team of skilled professionals dedicated to providing top-notch handyman services to the North Alabama area. With a focus on electrical work, flooring, drywall repair, and installations, we specialize in tackling a wide range of tasks with precision and expertise. Our local presence ensures a deep understanding of the unique needs of our community.

whyChooseUs.mainPitch: Experience unbeatable value and quality with our comprehensive handyman solutions tailored to your specific needs.
sellingPoints: Highly skilled technicians adept at handling complex electrical, plumbing, and carpentry projects with meticulous attention to detail.
Competitive pricing that doesn't compromise on quality, ensuring you get the best bang for your buck.
Commitment to using only the highest-quality materials and equipment, guaranteeing long-lasting results.
